txt.en: 'Amazing, is it not? I wonder what knowledge is within all these scrolls. Are you finished here? I can lead you back to Iridír, if you would like.'
A Dumûri warrior is offering to escort you back to Girhâzi's Lodge in Iridír, should you desire it.
Continue talking to the Dumûri warrior if you are ready to return to Iridír.
